definition: A term commonly used to describe the act or process of shutting down or closing something, often referring to the closure of a business, establishment, or organization. It can also refer to the closing of a physical object, such as a door or window.

examples.german: Die Schließung des Geschäfts wurde angekündigt.
examples.english: The closure of the business was announced.

examples.german: Die Schließung des Parks erfolgt um 22 Uhr.
examples.english: The closing of the park is at 10 PM.

examples.german: Die Schließung der Schule wurde aufgrund des Sturms veranlasst.
examples.english: The closure of the school was ordered due to the storm.

examples.german: Die Schließung des Kontos kann online beantragt werden.
examples.english: The closure of the account can be requested online.

examples.german: Die Schließung des Flughafens führte zu zahlreichen Flugausfällen.
examples.english: The closure of the airport resulted in numerous flight cancellations.
